channel.title: How do i change
channel.description:
How do change the main menu nscreen when i log in ...
and
How do i change commands ? e.g ::barrows how do i get rid of it ? and then add sumthing else in and make sure it puts the items i want in[br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 12:03:43 PM[/size][hr]?

item.title: How do i change
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

[code][code]1. Main menu screen.

Is there a command to open it or does it automatically open?

  1. Commands.
    Search for:
else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows"))

or
[/code]
else if (command.startsWith(“barrows”))
[/code]
Remove it within the brackets []

Read full topic
